javacc.structure

Class TopicMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • javacc.structure.TopicMap

  • public class TopicMap
extends java.lang.Object
    One object TopicMap is contained in every XTM

    • Method Detail

      • putTopic

        public boolean putTopic(Topic topic)
        Add a Topic into the current TopicMap
        Parameters:
        topic - The Topic to insert
        Returns:
        TRUE if success, FALSE if that Topic already exist (check if ID already exists)

      • getTopic

        public Topic getTopic(java.lang.String idTopic)
        Try to return a Topic
        Parameters:
        idTopic - The Topic ID of the topic
        Returns:
        NULL only if the topic does not exist

      • getAllTopicsID

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAllTopicsID()
        Return the Topics List
        Returns:
        List of topics ID

      • putAssociation

        public boolean putAssociation(Association association)
        Add an Association to the current Topic Map. Warning: cannot check duplicates
        Parameters:
        association - The Association to add
        Returns:
        Always true, but duplicated cannot be eliminated!

      • getAssociationList

        public java.util.List<Association> getAssociationList()
        Return the List od Associations of the current TopicMap
        Returns:
        The Associations List
